entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.7°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
